cards.title: Legacy
powers: Until the start of your next turn, increase damage dealt by Hero targets by 1.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.
Until the start of your next turn, reduce damage dealt by Environment cards by 2.

openingLines.default: We fight this day for liberty and for justice!
openingLines.BaronBladeCharacter: Stand down, Baron! The price of your hatred should not be the entire planet!
openingLines.MadBomberBladeCharacter: Stop this madness, Blade! You threaten the lives of the innocent!
openingLines.IronLegacyCharacter: The world deserves protecting! A few bad eggs can't condemn the entire planet!
openingLines.BaronBladeTeamCharacter: You may fool your followers into fighting for you, but you cannot prevail!
openingLines.MissInformationTeamCharacter: Aminia! You need help! Let me take you in so that you can be well again!
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: Whether one person or the whole world in danger, I will always answer the call!

cards.title: Back-Fist Strike
cards.flavorText: The best offense is{BR}knowing what's right behind you.

flavorQuotes.text: We fight this day . . . for freedom!

cards.title: Danger Sense
cards.body: {Legacy} is immune to damage from environment cards.

cards.title: Flying Smash
cards.body: {Legacy} deals up to 3 targets 3 melee damage each.

flavorQuotes.text: As you can see, we are{BR}untouch- . . . what was that?

cards.title: Fortitude
cards.flavorText: Legacy took times like{BR}these to ponder what dinner{BR}might involve tonight.

cards.title: Heroic Interception
body: When this card enters play, {Legacy} deals himself 3 melee damage.
Hero targets other than {Legacy} are immune to damage.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card.

cards.title: Inspiring Presence
body: When this card enters play, each hero target regains 1 HP.
Increase damage dealt by hero targets by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: . . . For freedom, for liberty,{BR}for justice . . . for [b]America![/b]

cards.title: Lead from the Front
cards.body: Whenever a hero target would be dealt damage by a villain card, you may redirect that damage to {Legacy}.

flavorQuotes.text: I'd much rather follow a{BR}[b]leader[/b] than follow orders.

cards.title: Motivational Charge
powers: {Legacy} deals 1 target 2 melee damage. Each hero target regains 1 HP.

cards.title: Next Evolution
cards.flavorText: Like her father,{BR}Pauline Felicia Parsons inherited{BR}all of the legacy powers, and also{BR}developed some new abilities . . .
powers: {Legacy} is immune to the damage type of your choice until the start of your next turn.

cards.title: Superhuman Durability
cards.body: Whenever {Legacy} would be dealt 5 or more damage from a single source, reduce that damage by 3.

flavorQuotes.text: You will [b]never[/b] defeat{BR}freedom or the human spirit!

cards.title: Surge of Strength

flavorQuotes.text: Excuse me,{BR}I have a train to catch.

cards.flavorReference: Paul Parsons, a day in the life: Legacy

cards.title: Take Down
body: At the end of your turn, the villain target with the highest HP deals {Legacy} 2 energy damage.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card.

cards.title: The Legacy Ring
cards.body: You may use an additional power during your power phase.

flavorQuotes.text: Sometimes, all it takes{BR}is a little brute force!

promoCards.title: Legacy
incapacitatedAbilities: One Hero may use a Power.
One Player may draw a card.
Until the start of your next turn, increase damage dealt by heroes by 1.

openingLines.default: We fight for what's right! Gotta make Dad proud!
openingLines.BaronBladeCharacter: You couldn't defeat my father, and you'll find me just as tough!
openingLines.MadBomberBladeCharacter: You're crazier than you are dangerous... and you're really dangerous!
openingLines.IronLegacyCharacter: I don't know who you think you are, but my father would never act like this. You're going down.
openingLines.BaronBladeTeamCharacter: Baron Blade! You're looking... well, awful. You look terrible.
openingLines.MissInformationTeamCharacter: You aren't the same Aminia Twain I grew up admiring. You're no friend of me or my family!
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: Legacy here, taking point! Fall in behind me, and we'll hit him together!

promoCards.title: Legacy
powers: 1 hero regains 1 HP and may use a power.
incapacitatedAbilities: One Hero may use a Power.
One Player may draw a card.
Discard the top card of a deck.

openingLines.default: The actions you take become your own legacy. Stand proud!
openingLines.BaronBladeCharacter: You remind me of your father. I'm afraid to say that's not a compliment.
openingLines.MadBomberBladeCharacter: Shape up, pal. You've made your threats, but are you ready to face the consequences?
openingLines.IronLegacyCharacter: No Paul Parsons would ever stoop to such levels! Remember your father's legacy!
openingLines.BaronBladeTeamCharacter: Now see here, we'll have none of that. You're breaking the law, and you'll be held accountable for your actions!
openingLines.MissInformationTeamCharacter: This isn't the first time I've faced world shattering oppression, and you won't make it my last.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: If I go down fighting, someone else will step up. There will [b]always[/b] be a hero to oppose evils like you!

promoCards.title: Legacy
powers: You may either move an environment card in play to the bottom of the environment deck, or one player may play a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card, even if they would otherwise be prevented.
One player may use a power, even if they would otherwise be prevented.
One player may draw a card, even if they would otherwise be prevented.

openingLines.default: We stand together against injustice, in all its forms!
openingLines.BaronBladeCharacter: Step away from the Doomsday Device, Baron. You should know better by now.
openingLines.MadBomberBladeCharacter: How can you be so callous towards innocent lives? You will endanger no more lives this day.
openingLines.IronLegacyCharacter: If you call this bringing justice to the people, then my place is between you and them.
openingLines.BaronBladeTeamCharacter: Your formulas and obsessions will be your undoing, Ivan. Step back from the precipice before it is too late!
openingLines.MissInformationTeamCharacter: Even if it isn't the Freedom Five, there will always be heroes!
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: Each and every one of us made a choice to be here. I'm proud of all of you.
